_source.text: 6. Space Ghost - Nothing better than getting way too high and watching this show- Space Ghost is probably the best talk show host ever, rivaled only by Conan O'Brien and maybe Johnny Carson.

text: 6. Space Ghost - Nothing **better** **than** getting way too high and watching this show- Space Ghost is probably the best talk show host ever, rivaled only by **Conan** **O'Brien** and maybe **Johnny** **Carson**.
